lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Central Bank governor Arifin Siregar said earlier this week that Indonesia could look forward to better economic prospects in 1987/88, but added the "speculators" who led a run on the rupiah late last year could again pose problems.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: March is usually a tight month for the money market because of tax payments and banks' need to attract funds for their year-end accounts on March 31.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: They normally try to do things before the IGGI (Inter-Governmental Group on Indonesia) meeting (in June) to prove they are doing something about the economy to show they deserve a couple of billion dollars."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: They normally try to do things before the IGGI (Inter-Governmental Group on Indonesia) meeting (in June) to prove they are doing something about the economy to show they deserve a couple of billion dollars."
